column2: it is a little bit of zoo and they might run out of what you want to eat.  Either call ahead or be ready to play it by ear.  I wouldn't want to eat in on a crowded night.  It's too bad they don't deliver
column3: although it would likely take forever.  Not terribly difficult to get to but there's not much else to do in that neighborhood except get back on the El or in a cab if you can find one.
